attributes.action: resign for lying to the House in respect of the effect of proposed changes to the rates of Vehicle Excise Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister stated last month in the House of Commons, in response to a question from the Leader of the Opposition regarding the effects of the new Vehicle Excise Duty rates, that "the majority of drivers will benefit from it."

However, a Commons written answer to shadow Treasury minister Justine Greening has confirmed that the Prime Minister lied to the House.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
